verses.roman:
goyālāra gośālā haya atyanta vistāra
ihāṅ saṅkīrṇa-sthala, tomāra manuṣya--apāra"

synonyms: goyālāra—of a milkman; go-śālā—cow shed; haya—is; atyanta—very; vistāra—spacious; ihāṅ—here; saṅkīrṇa-sthala—very narrow place; tomāra—Your; manuṣya—adherents; apāra—unlimited.
translation: "You might go to the house of a milkman, for the cow shed is spacious, whereas the space here in the Durgā-maṇḍapa is insufficient because You have many followers with You."
